channel.title: Comments on: not another new feature?

item.title: By: matt
item.dc:creator: matt
item.description: <p>having tried it now, i realise that i have got the security wrong so you won't be able to comment until i get some time to fix it<br/> <br/> oooh it's so near and yet so far!</p>
item.content:encoded:
having tried it now, i realise that i have got the security wrong so you won’t be able to comment until i get some time to fix it

oooh it’s so near and yet so far!

item.title: By: matt
item.dc:creator: matt
item.description: <p>i have had a few minutes and the comments feature is working now</p>
item.content:encoded: i have had a few minutes and the comments feature is working now
